user.title: Set up BACnet Hub
user.description: Please enter instance number, local address, object name and description.

error.invalid_address: Invalid address. Allowed format: IP[/prefix][:port], for example 192.168.31.36/24:47808.

device.title: Device settings
device.description: Configure local instance number, address, object name, description and labels import. Matching entities are mapped automatically on registry/label updates.

error.invalid_label_selection: Please select at least one valid label.
